json.company_description: National University Libraries provides access to various academic resources including e-journals, e-books, theses, dissertations, and faculty publications.

warning: This scrape job was throttled at your current concurrency limit. If you'd like to scrape faster, you can upgrade your plan.
summary: The National University eLibrary provides access to various resources including e-journal and e-book databases, open access theses, and faculty publications. Key databases include Hindawi Publishing, PubMed Central, and Project Gutenberg. The library catalog allows users to search by title, author, subject, and more. Faculty publications are categorized by college, with notable authors listed. The library also offers advanced search options and contact information for different colleges within the university.
